title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Upstairs unit Near Fulton Market
posting_body: ['460 N Aberdeed st.', 'Apt 2.', 'Located on the heart of River West Neighborhood, Surrounded by coffe shops, pubs, restaurants, and other great shopping.', 'Walk to the Grand Blue Line, Morgan Green and Pink Line, 65 Grand and Aberdeen bus stop.', 'and other public transportation.', 'Easy access to both the Kennedy and Eisenhower Expressways.', 'This is a must see sunny rehabbed (2) bedroom,  (2) bathroom apartment with central air-conditioning.', 'Open style living room and kitchen with high ceilings, hardwood flooring.', 'Modern kitchen features with appliances including dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, stove, under the cabinet lighting, and disposal.', 'Spacious closets in bedroom and living room; spacious bathrooms with shower system and great lighting fixtures.', 'Shared laundry room with large outside deck.', 'Parking space in heated garage for additional fee.', ' Available 8/1/22 $2400.00.', 'Pets negotiable.', 'Contact Dan 312-617-7873']
